title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. VII, subch. B, art. 1, pt. 472 - Contributions To State Unemployment Insurance Fund
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. VII, subch. B, art. 1, pt. 472 - Contributions To State Unemployment Insurance Fund

State Regulations
§ 472.1 - Status report
§ 472.2 - Employer records
§ 472.3 - Reports and payments of contributions
§ 472.4 - Reports of remuneration and employment
§ 472.5 - Employees' social security account numbers
§ 472.6 - Transfers of accounts
§ 472.7 - Posting of notice for employees
§ 472.8 - Notice upon separation
§ 472.9 - Payment of contributions and reports in regard to seamen's remuneration paid under shipping articles
§ 472.10 - Apportionment of remuneration, vacation payments or allowances in connection with experience rating
§ 472.11 - Transfer of out-of-state experience
§ 472.12 - Responding to requests for information and employer relief of charges-timely and adequately requirement for responding

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. VII, subch. B, art. 1, pt. 472

Statutory authority: Labor Law, §§530, 575; art. 18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
